groups.name: thinker.cloud.cookie
groups.description: Configuration properties for thinker cloud session settings.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.cookie.cookie-path
properties.description: Sets the path of the cookie. Defaults to the context path from the HttpServletRequest if not set. If null, the default context path will be used.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.cookie.cookie-name
properties.description: The name of the cookie. It cannot be empty.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.cookie.cookie-max-age
properties.description: Sets the maxAge attribute of the cookie. Defaults to expire when the browser is closed. 1209600 equals 60 * 60 * 24 * 14 seconds.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.cookie.cookie-domain
properties.description: Sets an explicit domain for the cookie. This allows the cookie to be shared across subdomains when the request comes from www.example.com, using the 'example.com' domain.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.cookie.use-base64-encoding
properties.description: Sets whether the cookie value should be Base64 encoded. This is valuable for supporting RFC 6265, which recommends Base 64 encoding for cookie values.
